feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:07 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -11.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 5:29 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -11.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -13.3°C
Wind: NW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
